title: Amore
description: From USA Today bestselling author Kimberly Knight comes a mood-lifting second-chance romance with a touch of suspense that will have you turning the pages.The night before Frankie went off to college, she asked her best friend, Luke, for a favor. A favor that would change their lives forever. A favor that would tear them apart.Nine years later, Frankie is a world-famous actress, and Luke is a police officer for the LAPD. Their lives couldn’t be more different. Desperate to know where things went wrong for them, the two meet to talk. Not long after reconnecting, Frankie discovers she has a stalker. Wanting to keep the woman he’s always loved safe, Luke becomes her bodyguard. But outside forces could ruin their new beginning.Especially when Frankie finds herself staring down the barrel of Luke’s gun.AMORE is a complete stand-alone in the ABCs of Love series where one author a week will deliver a brand-new story for you to rediscover your ABCs.
author: Kimberly Knight
